attributes.action: put pressure on the Israeli government to release 51 Palestinian MPs and Ministers detained in Israeli jails along with 11.870 detained Palestinians amongst them women, school children, old, sick ... prisons are created for criminals not for representatives of people and freedom fighters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
